title: Bitcoin/Litecoin cpu miner
description:
This is a multi-threaded CPU miner for Litecoin and Bitcoin.

Basically what i have done is made it really simple to start mining and generating your own bitcoins and litecoins. This is the easiest way to get started with mining and learn how it works.

The files that are contained in the torrent are the program files needed for the software to work, these are stored under the filename "Data". The two batch files are simple there to make the process easier, all that you have to do is firstly run the "Start proxy.bat" file and wait about two seconds, the last line in the terminal should end with "clean_jobs=True", then you know that it worked fine. Next all you have to do is run the "Start mining.bat" file, this will start the mining process.

Just to recap the setup process:

1. run "Start proxy.bat"
2. configure the batch file "Start mining.bat" to your credentials
3. run "Start mining.bat"
4. and lastly enjoy watching the bitcoins/litecoins roll into your pocket
